alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:21AM EST until February 18 at 3:09AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... White River, Eagle Creek, and Eel River. .Melted snowpack combined with rainfall amounts of one to over two inches from Wednesday evening through today falling on frozen ground has caused significant runoff which will produce flooding along area rivers. Along the main stem rivers, flooding could be lengthened and possibly worsened by another storm system next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eagle Creek at Zionsville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Turkey Foot Road north of Temple Avenue and Holliday Road begins to flood. Low areas of Lions Park and Creekside Nature Park are flooded. Possible flooding of portions of Zionsville Golf Course. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 9.5 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later today.
